databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_ALARM_DATE.MS_ALARM_DATE_ID, MS_ALARM_DATE.MS_ALARM_DATE_NAME, MS_ALARM_DATE.DAY_OFFSET, MS_ALARM_DATE.DELETE_FLAG, MS_ALARM_DATE.SEND_FLAG, MS_ALARM_DATE.VESSEL_ID, MS_ALARM_DATE.DATA_NO, MS_ALARM_DATE.USER_KEY, MS_ALARM_DATE.RENEW_DATE, MS_ALARM_DATE.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_ALARM_DATE.TS FROM MS_ALARM_DATE ORDER BY MS_ALARM_DATE.MS_ALARM_DATE_ID

SELECT MS_ALARM_DATE.MS_ALARM_DATE_ID, MS_ALARM_DATE.MS_ALARM_DATE_NAME, MS_ALARM_DATE.DAY_OFFSET, MS_ALARM_DATE.DELETE_FLAG, MS_ALARM_DATE.SEND_FLAG, MS_ALARM_DATE.VESSEL_ID, MS_ALARM_DATE.DATA_NO, MS_ALARM_DATE.USER_KEY, MS_ALARM_DATE.RENEW_DATE, MS_ALARM_DATE.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_ALARM_DATE.TS FROM MS_ALARM_DATE WHERE MS_ALARM_DATE.MS_ALARM_DATE_ID = :MS_ALARM_DATE_ID

INSERT INTO MS_ALARM_DATE ( MS_ALARM_DATE_ID, MS_ALARM_DATE_NAME, DAY_OFFSET, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES ( :MS_ALARM_DATE_ID, :MS_ALARM_DATE_NAME, :DAY_OFFSET, :DELETE_FLAG, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO, :USER_KEY, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_ALARM_DATE SET
MS_ALARM_DATE_NAME = :MS_ALARM_DATE_NAME, DAY_OFFSET = :DAY_OFFSET, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE (MS_ALARM_DATE_ID = :MS_ALARM_DATE_ID) AND (TS = :TS)
